#summary How to bootstrap iNetHack on Mac OS X.
#labels nethack,bootstrapping

= Introduction =

I could have sworn I had created a page for this, but apparently not ...

= Details =

All commands to be executed from nethack top level directory.

Create makefiles:

  * cd sys/unix; sh setup.sh

Build TTY NetHack:

  * In config.h, switch from IPHONE_GRAPHICS to TTY_GRAPHICS
  * make all
